positions.title: Product Manager
positions.description_html:
‚û°Ô∏è Product Manager | Talent Tracking System & Resolve VR Integration

üåü Developed a Talent Tracking System for 3.5k employees to identify in-house talent to fullfil project allocation needs, strategic decision making and hiring needs.

üìà Performed market research, created user journey, wireframes, and collaborated with developer team to integrate VR solution with internal automation tool.

üîç Developed Client Desk Platform Usage dashboard, conducted 60+ client meetings to understand pain-points and feature requirements, onboarded 50% of total clients within 2 months, drove engagement and retention plans.

positions.subtitle: Pinnacle Infotech

publications: [{"title":"Newsletter Awaaz 2021","subtitle":"Awaaz IIT Kharagpur","date":"September 1, 2021","description":"Every Year we release a Newsletter about all the happening of IIT Kharagpur. We also write articles on extraordinary achievement of Student, Professors."}]
projects: [{"title":"Hult Prize Pitch Deck","start_date":"Feb 2023","end_date":"Feb 2023","description":"We participated in the Hult Prize, where we presented our idea to transform the Fashion industry and address the problem originating from Fast Fashion both at the producer level and consumer level. Read our interesting presentation and report"},{},{},{},{},{"title":"Flipkart APM Deck","start_date":"Nov 2022","end_date":"Nov 2022","description":"Flipkart hires for Associate Product Manager through a Deck Making Round. I created a deck solving a post-pandemic problem in Linkedin Creator Community. The lack of Advanced Analytical tools and features is one of the problems faced by the creators of LinkedIn. I suggested measures that can improve user engagement and increase content posting along with better audience management."},{"title":"Bachelor Thesis Project: Waste Management in IIT Kharagpur Eating Mess","start_date":"Sep 2022","end_date":"Nov 2022","description":"I worked on my Bachelor Thesis Project on Waste Management in Mess and Local Eateries of IIT Kharagpur. I took a survey to understand the Food eating behaviour of students and the tendency to leave food on plates. I figure about ways to detect the total waste hence money waste on a daily basis and talked about solutions which can be implemented to stop wastage."},{"title":"HPAIR","start_date":"Jan 2022","end_date":"Jan 2022","description":"Two time accepted delegate of The Harvard Project for Asian and International Relations (HPAIR)"},{"title":"Bronze | Open IIT Case Study : How to Open IIT KGP?","start_date":"Mar 2021","end_date":"May 2021","description":"Developed a Mathematical Model to predict the no. of cases on campus and suggested various measures.Estimated total cost, made a timeline, and suggested revenue resources for calling 14k students from all over India."},{},{"title":"Indian Case Challenge 2021","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"Investigated about Jindal Stainless Operations and it's Domestic Market. Suggested Opportunities Overseas and Key for Growth and improvements by solving logistical problems faced by the company. Also suggested about the E-Commerce and using Digitization as a mean to solve problems."},{"title":"Case Study - Post Covid World","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"Investigated on the changes which may occur in the Pandemic and it's Impact on the Upcoming Future."},{"title":"Indian Case Challenge 2020","start_date":"Nov 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"Successfully Investigated a case study project organized by Business club IIT Kharagpur in association with Kshitij 2020. The case study was based on the downfall of Boeing 737 Max 8 due to Two accidents during flight, killing many people. The case study gives guidance and corrective measures to be taken by Boeing which can bring it back again in the mainstream and avoid such terrible incidents in the upcoming future."}]
